languages.text: "Да, Домин'{name}. Твои слова отдаются в моей душе эхом согласия. Немезит падет, ибо его путь темен и лжив". {n}Кибелла проводит металлическим когтем по губам, скрепляя обещание кровью.{/n}

"Yes, Domin'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his ways are dark and have led him astray." {n}Kibellah trails a metal claw across her lips, sealing her promise with blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да, Домин'{name}. Твои слова отдаются в моей душе эхом согласия. Немезит падет, ибо его путь темен и лжив". {n}Кибелла проводит металлическим когтем по губам, скрепляя обещание кровью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Enim'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his way is dark and led him astray." {n}Kibellah runs a metal claw across her lips, sealing the promise with blood.{/n}

"Yes, Enim'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his way is dark and led him astray." {n}Kibellah runs a metal claw across her lips, sealing the promise with blood.{/n}

"Yes, Enim'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his way is dark and has led him astray." {n}Kibellah trails a metal claw across her lips, sealing her promise with blood.{/n}

"Yes, Enim'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his way is dark and has led him astray." {n}Kibellah trails a metal claw across her lips, sealing her promise with blood.{/n}

"Yes, Domin'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his ways are dark and have led him astray." {n}Kibellah trails a metal claw across her lips, sealing her promise with blood.{/n}

"Yes, Domin'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his ways are dark and have led him astray." {n}Kibellah trails a metal claw across her lips, sealing her promise with blood.{/n}

languages.text: "Ja, Domin'{name}. Eure Worte hallen durch meine Seele und wir sind im Einklang. Nemesit wird fallen, denn seine Pfade sind dunkel und haben ihn vom Weg abgebracht." {n}Kibellah streicht mit einer metallenen Klaue über ihre Lippen, um ihr Versprechen mit Blut zu besiegeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Domin'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his ways are dark and have led him astray." {n}Kibellah trails a metal claw across her lips, sealing her promise with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Domin'{name}. Eure Worte hallen durch meine Seele und wir sind im Einklang. Nemesit wird fallen, denn seine Pfade sind dunkel und haben ihn vom Weg abgebracht." {n}Kibellah streicht mit einer metallenen Klaue über ihre Lippen, um ihr Versprechen mit Blut zu besiegeln.{/n}

languages.text: «Sí, Domin'{name}. Sus palabras resuenan en mi alma, y coincido plenamente con usted. Nemesitio sucumbirá, pues su camino es oscuro y se ha descarriado». {n}Kibellah se corta el labio con una garra de metal, sellando su promesa con sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Domin'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his ways are dark and have led him astray." {n}Kibellah trails a metal claw across her lips, sealing her promise with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sí, Domin'{name}. Sus palabras resuenan en mi alma, y coincido plenamente con usted. Nemesitio sucumbirá, pues su camino es oscuro y se ha descarriado». {n}Kibellah se corta el labio con una garra de metal, sellando su promesa con sangre.{/n}

languages.text: 「えぇ、ドミン・{name}。あなたの言葉は私の魂に響くわ。ネメサイトは必ず倒れる。彼の道は暗く、彼を迷わせたのだから」{n}キベラは金属の爪を唇に当て、血で約束を絶対のものにする。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Domin'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his ways are dark and have led him astray." {n}Kibellah trails a metal claw across her lips, sealing her promise with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「えぇ、エニム・{name}。あなたの言葉は私の魂に響くわ。ネメサイトは必ず倒れる。彼の道は暗く、彼を迷わせたのだから」{n}キベラは金属の爪を唇に当て、血で約束を絶対のものにする。{/n}

languages.text: “正是如此，秘者{name}。你的话在我的灵魂中回响，我们心心相印。涅墨斯特必将陨落，因为他的道路充满黑暗，他迷失了方向。”{n}绮贝菈用金属利爪划过嘴唇，用鲜血见证了誓言。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Domin'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his ways are dark and have led him astray." {n}Kibellah trails a metal claw across her lips, sealing her promise with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “正是如此，秘者{name}。你的话在我的灵魂中回响，我们心心相印。涅墨斯特必将陨落，因为他的道路充满黑暗，他迷失了方向。”{n}绮贝菈用金属利爪划过嘴唇，用鲜血见证了誓言。{/n}

languages.text: « Oui, Domin'{name}. Vos propos résonnent dans mon âme et nous sommes parfaitement d'accord là-dessus. Némésite tombera, car sa voie de ténèbres l'a écarté du droit chemin. » {n}Kibellah passe une griffe métallique le long de ses lèvres, scellant sa promesse par le sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Domin'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his ways are dark and have led him astray." {n}Kibellah trails a metal claw across her lips, sealing her promise with blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oui, Domin'{name}. Vos propos résonnent dans mon âme et nous sommes parfaitement d'accord là-dessus. Némésite tombera, car sa voie de ténèbres l'a écarté du droit chemin. » {n}Kibellah passe une griffe métallique le long de ses lèvres, scellant sa promesse par le sang.{/n}

languages.text: "Evet Domin'{name}. Sözlerin ruhumda yankı buluyor ve ikimiz de aynı bakış açısına sahibiz. Nemezit ölecek çünkü o karanlık yöntemler izliyor ve bu yöntemler onu yoldan çıkarmış." {n}Kibellah metal bir pençeyi dudaklarında gezdiriyor ve sözünü kanla kalıcılaştırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Yes, Domin'{name}. Your words echo through my soul, and we are in accord. Nemesite will fall, for his ways are dark and have led him astray." {n}Kibellah trails a metal claw across her lips, sealing her promise with blood.{/n}
